name: copy-as-markdown
description: Copy Link or Image as Markdown code, a Web Extension

scripts.build-chrome: sh compile.sh chrome && zip -r build/chrome.zip chrome/
scripts.build-firefox: sh compile.sh firefox && npx web-ext build -s firefox/ -a build/firefox/
scripts.build-firefox-mv3: sh compile.sh firefox-mv3 && npx web-ext build -s firefox-mv3/ -a build/firefox-mv3/
scripts.debug-chrome: npx nodemon --exec 'sh compile.sh chrome' & npx web-ext run -s chrome/ -t chromium --args chrome://extensions https://example.com
scripts.debug-edge: npx nodemon --exec 'sh compile.sh chrome' & npx web-ext run -s chrome/ -t chromium --chromium-binary '/Applications/Microsoft Edge.app/Contents/MacOS/Microsoft Edge' --args chrome://extensions https://example.com
scripts.debug-firefox-mv2: npx nodemon --exec 'sh compile.sh firefox-mv2' & npx web-ext run -s firefox-mv2/ --url about:debugging#/runtime/this-firefox https://example.com
scripts.debug-firefox: npx nodemon --exec 'sh compile.sh firefox' & npx web-ext run -s firefox/ --url about:debugging#/runtime/this-firefox https://example.com
